definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: In order to content the productive capacity of soda, a new calciner system was added.
sentences.chinese: 为满足纯碱生产能力，新增一套煅烧炉系统。

sentences.english: The influences of the calcinations furnace's structure type on the performance of the integrated methanol catalysts are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了煅烧炉的结构型式对联醇催化剂性能的影响。

sentences.english: So, the activity of metakaolin is the highest after calcined at 700℃.
sentences.chinese: 因此，700℃下煅烧得到的偏高岭土活性最高。

sentences.english: Pure lithium zinc ferrites were synthesized by means of a combination of sol-gel method and subsequent calcination.
sentences.chinese: 结合溶胶凝胶法与后期煅烧制备了纯锂锌铁氧体。

sentences.english: The differential calcination technology is introduced in this paper to stabilize the high temperature layer of clinker calcined by shaft kiln.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了采用差热煅烧法稳定立窑烧成熟料的高温层。

sentences.english: The effects of seeds and the calcination temperature on the properties of the powder were studied.
sentences.chinese: 分析了添加籽晶和煅烧温度对粉体性能的影响。

sentences.english: It is also made clear that the higher the calcine temperature is, the better the crystallization becomes.
sentences.chinese: 微波烧结样品的催化特性和结晶比电炉煅烧的稍好。

sentences.english: During the synthesis process of titanium oxide pillared bentonite, the calcinations temperature is the most important.
sentences.chinese: 钛柱撑膨润土的制备过程中，煅烧温度至关重要。

sentences.english: The new process of calcine for ammonium paratungstate to tungsten trioxide by microwave was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了微波煅烧仲钨酸铵制取三氧化钨的新工艺。

sentences.english: Light-burned magnesia is prepared by calcining magnesite.
sentences.chinese: 本文通过煅烧菱镁矿制备轻烧氧化镁。

sentences.english: The maxim strength is found when calcination temperature is 600℃.
sentences.chinese: 煅烧温度在600℃所制无水石膏水泥强度最大。

sentences.english: The production process and its application in latex paint of this calcinated kaolin clay were described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了该煅烧高岭土的生产工序及其在乳胶漆的应用。

sentences.english: The powders synthesized are uniform in size, but there are partially hard particle agglomerates in the powders.
sentences.chinese: 煅烧后粉体尺寸均匀，但部分颗粒间存在硬团聚。

sentences.english: It has to be crushed after firing and the aggregate therefore has sharp corners .
sentences.chinese: 煅烧后需要进行破碎，因此骨料具有尖锐的棱角。

sentences.english: The carrier is calcined after loading the sulfating agent and the chromium on the carrier.
sentences.chinese: 在将硫酸化剂和铬装载在载体之后煅烧载体。

sentences.english: Kaolin and other kaolinic clays, whether or not calcined.
sentences.chinese: 高岭土及类似土，不论是否煅烧。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
to quench/to temper/to harden by quenching
